originalText.text: By far the best massage experience thanks to Ellen's time and attention to address my pain issues. It's been almost four days since my my massage and Ellen's expert care has had a lasting effect. Accept no substitutes, and get the best care with Ellen.

text.text: By far the best massage experience thanks to Ellen's time and attention to address my pain issues. It's been almost four days since my my massage and Ellen's expert care has had a lasting effect. Accept no substitutes, and get the best care with Ellen.

originalText.text: Ellen does excellent work, I am so thankful I found her! I came in looking to address some pain in my shoulders and she really listened to all of my concerns. During my Swedish, she focused on the areas that really needed attention based on what I shared with her. I've already returned to her for additional massage and I plan to come back! Highly recommend!

text.text: Ellen does excellent work, I am so thankful I found her! I came in looking to address some pain in my shoulders and she really listened to all of my concerns. During my Swedish, she focused on the areas that really needed attention based on what I shared with her. I've already returned to her for additional massage and I plan to come back! Highly recommend!

originalText.text: I got the Eastern/Western massage, and it was amazing! It was *truly* deep tissue, far better than any other massage I've gotten. I left feeling so much lighter and more integrated, with no tension in my neck and shoulders. Ellen shared bits of knowledge relevant to my particular pain points and issues—I'm so grateful, and I will definitely go back ASAP! Her space is so beautiful, too. Highly recommend.

text.text: I got the Eastern/Western massage, and it was amazing! It was *truly* deep tissue, far better than any other massage I've gotten. I left feeling so much lighter and more integrated, with no tension in my neck and shoulders. Ellen shared bits of knowledge relevant to my particular pain points and issues—I'm so grateful, and I will definitely go back ASAP! Her space is so beautiful, too. Highly recommend.

originalText.text: Ellen's massages are incredible. I always walk out feeling centered and five inches taller than when I went in. Ellen takes time to check in and register if something has changed in my body. When I first went to her, I was scheduled for knee surgery. She helped me stay relaxed and maintain body alignment as I headed into the surgery and as I went through the recovery process. After several years of minimal exercise, I have returned to a daily exercise regime, which I believe is a direct result of working with Ellen. She is a complete pro who has my highest recommendation.

text.text: Ellen's massages are incredible. I always walk out feeling centered and five inches taller than when I went in. Ellen takes time to check in and register if something has changed in my body. When I first went to her, I was scheduled for knee surgery. After several years of minimal exercise, I have returned to a daily exercise regime, which I believe is a direct result of working with Ellen. She is a complete pro who has my highest recommendation.

originalText.text: Ellen is a real gem, unlike any massage therapist I have ever experienced. Not only does she provide relaxation but, more importantly, has very thorough knowledge of anatomy. She doesn't just move through the motions but "reads" your body and adjusts her work to where your body is at the time. Nothing ever feels rushed and Ellen gives her full intention and attention for the entire session. Her location is beautiful and the apartment tidy and clean. I am so lucky to have her right in my neighborhood! I also appreciate how flexible she is with her time to accommodate working schedules. Not only does she provide excellent bodywork but can also point out weaknesses in your musculature and provide exercises to help with strengthening. I am not in the habit of posting any reviews so please stop hesitating and book with Ellen!
